mission.title: Academy Mission
mission.subtitle: Creating the future of physical culture and sports through innovation, education and dedication to excellence
mission.missionStatement: To ensure the training of specialists in physical education and sports who possess professional and general cultural competencies, capable of addressing important tasks related to health formation and ensuring the physical and sports training of the population.
mission.visionStatement: Become a world leader in sports education, where every student reveals their potential, and scientific discoveries shape the future of physical culture and human health.

list.title: Academic Excellence
list.description: Strive for the highest standards of education and scientific research in physical culture

list.title: Innovation & Progress

list.title: Community & Collaboration
list.description: Create a supportive environment where students, teachers and athletes grow together

list.title: Scientific Approach
list.description: Base all decisions on evidence-based research and modern science data

cta.title: Ready to join our mission?
cta.description: Become part of the community shaping the future of physical culture and sports science

about.badge3: Modern Education in Physical Culture and Sports
about.intro: The Kyrgyz State Academy of Physical Culture and Sports named after B.T. Turusbekov is one of the oldest higher education institutions in the country, with a 70-year history.
about.intro1: It is a leading university in Kyrgyzstan, providing training of highly qualified specialists in the field of physical education, sports, and sports science.
about.intro2: The academy has a modern infrastructure: a unique sports base, library, dormitories, and academic buildings.
about.intro3: The B.T. Turusbekov KSAPS actively cooperates with international organizations, participates in scientific projects and sports competitions.
about.intro4: Graduates of the academy successfully work as physical education teachers, coaches in more than 30 sports, as well as sports managers both in Kyrgyzstan and abroad.

content.paragraph1: Our academy was founded to train highly qualified specialists in physical culture and sports. Over the years, we have created a unique educational ecosystem combining traditions and innovations.
content.paragraph2: Today we continue to develop, implementing modern technologies in educational process and expanding international cooperation. Our mission is to educate new generation of sports industry leaders.

content.paragraph1: Our academy was founded to train highly qualified specialists in physical culture, sports and related disciplines. Over the years, we have created a unique educational ecosystem combining fundamental knowledge with practical training.
content.paragraph2: Today we continue to develop, implementing innovative approaches to learning and strengthening international connections. Our mission is to shape future leaders of sports industry capable of influencing physical culture development worldwide.

requirements.age: Admission is carried out on a competitive basis according to the results of entrance examinations in IVS or OFP.
requirements.education: The final score also includes the average grade of the certificate or diploma (FPK).
requirements.exams: Admitted outside the competition on a budget basis:
requirements.language: Winners and prize-winners of the Olympic Games; Winners of World and Asian Championships; Winners of major international competitions; Winners of the current year‚Äôs Republican School Spartakiad (with supporting documents)

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.passport: Application form (filled out at the admissions office)
documents.diploma: State-issued education certificate (secondary school certificate or diploma of secondary vocational education)
documents.other: Athlete‚Äôs classification book (for applicants entering the coaching profile)

contacts.title: Important:
contacts.email: ORT exam results are not considered during admission!
contacts.phone: Applicants claiming admission outside the competition must provide:
contacts.address: MSIC (Master of Sports of International Class) certificate. Documents confirming achievements at international competitions or participation/victory in the current year‚Äôs School Spartakiad

faqs.question: What documents are needed for admission?
faqs.answer: For admission required: passport, education document, 3x4 photos, medical certificate. Check full document list at admissions committee.

faqs.question: Are there budget spots?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide budget spots for various directions. Number of spots limited and distributed based on entrance exam results.

faqs.question: What is document submission deadline?
faqs.answer: Document acceptance starts June 20 and continues until August 10 for bachelor's programs. We recommend submitting documents early.

generalInfo.description: Our master's programs combine fundamental scientific knowledge with practical training in physical culture, sports and rehabilitation. Students get in-depth knowledge in chosen specialization and develop research competencies.
features: Individual research projects under experienced mentors
Preparation for teaching in higher education

requirements.title: Higher Education
requirements.description: Bachelor's or specialist diploma in physical culture, sports, medicine or related disciplines. Minimum GPA 4.0.

requirements.title: Entrance Exams
requirements.description: Comprehensive specialty exam including theoretical part and professional interview. Some programs require practical test.

requirements.title: Motivation Letter
requirements.description: 1000-1500 word essay revealing scientific interests, career goals and program choice justification.

requirements.title: Recommendation Letters
requirements.description: Two recommendation letters from scientific supervisors or employers characterizing academic and professional qualities.

requirements.title: Language Requirements
requirements.description: Certificate confirming Russian language proficiency not lower than B2 (for foreign citizens).

generalInfo.description: PhD programs aim to train highly qualified scientists capable of conducting independent scientific research and contributing to sports science development. Programs combine deep theoretical preparation with practical research.

requirements.title: Master's Degree
requirements.description: Master's diploma in relevant field. Priority to candidates with publications and research experience.

requirements.title: Research Proposal
requirements.description: Detailed dissertation research plan 10-15 pages including relevance, goals, tasks, methods and expected results.

requirements.title: Supervisor Interview
requirements.description: Personal meeting with potential scientific supervisor to discuss research interests and work plan.

requirements.title: Publications & Research Experience
requirements.description: Scientific publications, conference participation or research projects experience is advantage.

requirements.title: Foreign Language
requirements.description: English proficiency sufficient for reading scientific literature and publications.

overview.title: Blockchain IP Management Platform
overview.description: Revolutionary intellectual property management system leveraging blockchain technology for secure, transparent, and efficient IP rights protection and commercialization.

blockchainCard.title: Blockchain Powered
blockchainCard.description: Every intellectual property asset is securely timestamped and immutably recorded on our distributed ledger technology.

items.title: Blockchain IP Verification System
items.description: A revolutionary system for verifying intellectual property rights using blockchain technology with enhanced security features and automated validation processes.
items.fullDescription: This patent describes a comprehensive system for intellectual property verification leveraging blockchain technology. It includes methods for timestamping, cryptographic proof generation, and automated validation processes that ensure the integrity and authenticity of IP assets. The system is designed to be scalable and interoperable across different blockchain networks.

features.title: Immutable Records
features.description: All IP registrations are permanently stored on blockchain with cryptographic proof of existence

features.title: Smart Contracts
features.description: Automated licensing and royalty distribution through self-executing smart contracts

features.title: Global Verification
features.description: Instant verification of IP rights across international jurisdictions

features.title: Real-time Monitoring
features.description: 24/7 monitoring of IP usage and automatic infringement detection

items.title: Enhanced Security
items.description: Military-grade encryption and decentralized storage protect your intellectual property

items.title: Cost Efficient
items.description: Reduce IP management costs by up to 70% with automated processes

items.title: Global Protection
items.description: Single registration provides international IP protection coverage

items.title: Instant Verification
items.description: Verify IP ownership and rights in seconds with blockchain technology

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Intellectual Property?
cta.description: Join hundreds of innovators already protecting their creations with our blockchain-powered IP management platform.

publications.title: Scientific Publications
publications.subtitle: Our research and scientific works in physical culture and sports

publications.title: Innovative methods of training highly qualified athletes
publications.abstract: Research dedicated to development and implementation of innovative training methods for athletes using modern technologies and biomechanical analysis.
publications.journal: Theory and Practice of Physical Culture
publications.citation: Ivanov A.V., Petrova M.K., Sidorov V.P. Innovative methods of training highly qualified athletes // Theory and Practice of Physical Culture. 2023. No.1. P. 45-52.

publications.title: Influence of psychological preparation on results in team sports
publications.abstract: Analysis of psychological factors influence on athlete performance in team sports and development of psychological training methods.
publications.citation: Kuznetsova E.N., Nikolaev S.M. Influence of psychological preparation on results in team sports // Sports Psychology. 2023. No.2. P. 28-35.

publications.title: Biomechanical analysis of sprinters' running technique
publications.abstract: Comprehensive biomechanical analysis of highly qualified sprinters' running technique using modern video recording methods and computer analysis.
publications.citation: Orlova T.K., Vasiliev P.D., Morozov A.S. Biomechanical analysis of sprinters' running technique // Sports Biomechanics. 2022. No.3. P. 15-23.

publications.title: Modern approaches to rehabilitation after sports injuries
publications.abstract: Development and testing of modern rehabilitation methods for athletes after musculoskeletal injuries using physiotherapy and kinesiotherapy.
publications.citation: Smirnov V.A., Kovaleva M.P. Modern approaches to rehabilitation after sports injuries // Sports Medicine. 2022. No.4. P. 34-41.

general.title: General Information
general.content: The College of Sports is a leading educational institution in the field of physical culture and sports.

1.title: Modern equipment

2.title: Professional teaching staff

mission.title: Mission of the College
mission.text: Formation of competitive specialists in the field of physical culture and sports through the integration of education, science and practice for the development of a healthy society and achievement of sports heights.

strategy.title: Development Strategy
strategy.text: The strategic goal of the college is to become a leading educational center in Central Asia for training specialists in the field of physical culture and sports.
strategy.details: Modernization of educational programs, development of research base, strengthening of material and technical base, international cooperation.

list.name: Study Visa
list.description: For students enrolling in main educational programs
list.validity: Up to 1 year with extension possibility

list.name: Short-term Visa
list.description: For summer school participants, language courses and short-term programs

list.name: Postgraduate Visa
list.description: For research staff, postgraduate students and researchers

list.name: Exchange Visa
list.description: For academic exchange program participants and partnership programs

list.name: International Passport
list.description: Valid passport with validity at least 1.5 years

list.name: Official Invitation
list.description: Invitation from educational institution, certified in established order

list.name: Photos
list.description: Color photos 3.5x4.5 cm on white background, meeting requirements

list.name: Visa Application
list.description: Completed visa application form of established format in Russian or English

list.name: Medical Insurance
list.description: Medical insurance policy valid in RF territory for entire stay period

list.name: Educational Documents
list.description: Certificates, diplomas and other education documents with notarized translation

notes.title: Important Notes
items: ‚Ä¢ All documents must be translated to Russian and notarized
‚Ä¢ Passport validity must be at least 1.5 years at submission
‚Ä¢ Medical insurance must cover entire stay period
‚Ä¢ Academy invitation is processed within 10 working days

list.question: How long does visa processing take?
list.answer: Standard application processing time is 10-20 working days. For urgent cases, expedited processing is possible for additional fee.

list.question: Do documents need to be translated to Russian?
list.answer: Yes, all documents must be translated to Russian and notarized. We can help with document translation and certification.

list.question: Can student visa be extended?
list.answer: Yes, student visa can be extended without leaving Russia. For this, you need to provide certificate from educational institution about continuing studies.

list.question: Does student visa permit work?
list.answer: Student visa allows work no more than 20 hours per week with appropriate permission from educational institution.

list.question: Can family members get visa?
list.answer: Yes, student's family members can get visa based on relationship. For this, documents confirming relationship must be provided.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including name, email address, and other contact details when you register for our programs.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: Your information is used to provide and improve our services, communicate with you about programs, and send important updates.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access or disclosure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time by contacting us.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

registration.title: Registration
registration.content: You must provide accurate and complete information during registration and keep your credentials secure.

conduct.title: Code of Conduct
conduct.content: All participants are expected to maintain respectful behavior and follow academy rules and regulations.

payments.title: Payments and Refunds
payments.content: Program fees are due as specified. Refund policies are outlined in your enrollment agreement.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate access for violations of these terms or inappropriate behavior.
